WorkItem.Description:

WorkItem.Summary: [Buffs] Blessing of Sanctuary str/sta stacks with Drums of Forgotten Kings

Comments.Message:
If you are comparing stats with buffs on that's not even close to "Base Stats"...

"Base Stats" would be naked with no buffs/talents
"Unbuffed Stats" would be geared/talented with no buffs
"Stats" or "Buffed Stats" would be would be geared/talented/buffed.

So what you are saying is that your "Buffed Stats" are "wrong"... which 90% of the time means you didn't select all the right buffs like you think you did.

And if you want to compare this stuff and have us look at it, we really need you to list out the stats you think are wrong as a side by side of in-game v Rawr, otherwise we have no way to check on your stuff.

The "Base Stats" I'm referring to are those listed near the top of the Stats tab in Rawr in a group box labeled "Base Stats."  Those change if I change a buff on the Buffs tab that affects those listed stats.  So I assumed that those "Base Stats" were intended to reflect the buff state (as selected on the Buffs tab).  At least that's what they appear to do for me.  I don't see a "Unbuffed Stats" or "Buffed Stats" section.

The buffs I selected on the Buffs tab are those from the attached character and accurately reflect the talents for the character (that should be verifiable from the Talents tab), the spells (Devotion Aura, Blessing of Sanctuary) and consumables (Scroll of Strength VIII, Dragonfin Filet, Drums of Forgotten Kings, Drums of the Wild, Runescroll of Fortitude, Elixir of Mighty Defense, Guru's Elixir) I use.

Unbuffed, my character has these values (parentheses for Rawr values as shown in "Base Stats" group box, with all buffs disabled):

Health: 37574 (37594, +20)
Mana: 5869 (5869, +0)
Strength: 1360 (1356, -4)
Agility: 128 (128, +0)
Stamina: 3082 (3084, +2)
Intellect: 117 (117, +0)

So, pretty close.  Stamina and strength off by a bit, but not much.

After applying the buffs described above (and as indicated in the attached character file), both in-game and on the Buffs tab, the values are:

Health: 43834 (46824, +2990)
Mana: 6724 (6724, +0)
Strength: 1657 (1785, +128)
Agility: 185 (198, +13)
Stamina: 3708 (4007, +299)
Intellect: 174 (174, +0)

Thanks Jothay, I appreciate your time looking at this.

So the Health being off is a direct product of your Stamina being off (note that it's Stamina*10).

I think that your STR difference is probably a bad confliction in Rawr between Blessing of Sanctuary and Drums of the Forgotten Kings. The 8% from one doesn't stack with the 10% from the other (10% should be overriding). Which is something we should fix.
Consequently the same thing applies to your STA.

To the 'doesn't stack' point, I don't know if this behavior is by design or a bug, but if either Blessing of Sanctuary or Drums of the Forgotten Kings is up, trying to cast/use the other is a total no-op (disregarding the party/raid effects of Forgotten Kings).  So while you might expect that with BoS up you'd still get the 8% boost to agility, int, and spirit by using Forgotten Kings, you do not.  Likewise, if Forgotten Kings is up, casting BoS does not take your strength and stamina buff from 8% to 10%--it does nothing.  First one wins.  It may be worth considering making those buffs mutually exclusive on the Buffs tab.
Thats news to me, I could swear it would just override the 8% with the higher 10%...
I'm with Jothay... I'm pretty sure Sanctuary was overriding ghetto Kings Sunday night.

It's possible that in a party or raid, if you're applying Blessing of Sanctuary after someone else has buffed you with Forgotten Kings, that it will overwrite.  I can't say one way or the other because I haven't tested it.  I will when I get the opportunity.

However, I have tested the solo behavior and reported the result here.  You're certainly free to dismiss it, but it's a result that's trivial to verify.

What should happen:

BoS only: 10% sta, 10% str, reduction in damage per hit, energy gain on avoid
DoFK only: 8% sta, 8% str, 8% agi, 8% int, 8% spi
Both BoS & DoFK: 10% sta, 10% str, 8% agi, 8% int, 8% spi, reduction in damage per hit, energy gain on avoid

Currently, however, you can only get one or the other.  I'm not sure what circumstances the bug is reproduced under, but this is a WoW bug, as indicated here: http://forums.wow-europe.com/thread.html?topicId=12947094658&sid=1

With that said, Rawr currently does this:

Both BoS & DoFK: 18% sta, 18% str, 8% agi, 8% int, 8% spi, reduction in damage per hit, energy gain on avoid

This is definitely incorrect, as 18% sta and str is too much.  So, what I'm going to do is add a Str/Sta bonus for drums of forgotten kings.  What you'll need to do is check "Drums of Forgotten Kings", "Greater Blessing of Sanctuary", and "Greater Blessing of Sanctuary (Str/Sta Bonus)" to get what you want.  People not using GBoSanctuary or GBoKings can check "Drums of Forgotten Kings" and "Drums of Forgotten Kings (Str/Sta Bonus)".

Also, I find it interesting that your in game stats represent 10% sta and str, but only 8% agi int and spi.  It's as if you checked this before the bug was in, or you managed to get both BoS and DoFK on at the same time despite the bug.  Might be worth playing around with to see how to get those two up together.
On another note, if you ever get a chance, please write me with your base stats, naked, unbuffed, and untalented.  I have a feeling that dwarven paladins haven't been updated in Rawr yet.
